definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]

sentences.english: First Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University, Department of Respiratory Medicine, deputy director of the Second Ward.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔滨医科大学附属第一医院呼吸内科二病房副主任。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss close venous indwelling needle used in the treatment of respiratory diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨密闭式静脉留置针在呼吸内科患者的应用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the causes and risk factors of ophthalmoplegia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨眼肌麻痹的内科性病因及主要危险因素。

sentences.english: In 1999, one in three Iranian physicians was a woman.
sentences.chinese: 在1999年，伊朗三分之一的内科医师是裙钗。

sentences.english: A physician should be consulted if there is evidence of infection.
sentences.chinese: 如果存在感染的迹象，应当立即咨询内科医生。

sentences.english: In internist popularization psychology disease related knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 内科医生中普及心理疾病的相关知识。

sentences.english: Sharkey teaches in multiple courses in clinical pathology and small animal internal medicine.
sentences.chinese: 莎基博士主要教授临床病理学和小动物内科相关课程。

sentences.english: This occupation group covers Internal Medicine Specialists not elsewhere classified.
sentences.chinese: 此职业小组包含了未分类的其他内科医师。

sentences.english: The author also presented diagnostic thought and experience in medical acute abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 本文还介绍了内科急腹症的诊断思路和体会。

sentences.english: He trained in neurology at the National Hospital for Nervous Diseases.
sentences.chinese: 他在国立神经内科医院接受神经病学的训练。

sentences.english: Xiao huang's sister is a doctor of internal medicine in the village clinic.
sentences.chinese: 黄的姐姐是乡卫生院的一名内科医生。

sentences.english: Peptic ulcer is a common disease in assimilation department. Dr.
sentences.chinese: 消化性溃疡是消化内科的常见病。

sentences.english: Psychiatrists were switching to internal medicine.
sentences.chinese: 精神病医师正转换到内科。

sentences.english: The study was published on Monday in the Archives of Internal Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究在星期一发表在内科医学档案上。

sentences.english: Department of Neurology, Hematology, Metabolism, Endocrinology and Diabetes (DNHMED)
sentences.chinese: 神经内科，血液科，代谢，内分泌和糖尿病学系。

sentences.english: Physicians and health professionals should be encouraged to increase their efforts at promotion of smoking cessation in all individuals.
sentences.chinese: 内科医生和健康专家更加积极努力地向病人推广戒烟。
